dt: {bc}a plant or plantlike organism of any of several phyla, divisions, or classes of chiefly aquatic usually chlorophyll-containing nonvascular organisms of {d_link|polyphyletic|polyphyletic} origin that usually include the green, yellow-green, brown, and {d_link|red algae|red alga} in the {d_link|eukaryotes|eukaryote} and especially formerly the {d_link|cyanobacteria|cyanobacterium} in the {d_link|prokaryotes|prokaryote}

shortdef: a plant or plantlike organism of any of several phyla, divisions, or classes of chiefly aquatic usually chlorophyll-containing nonvascular organisms of polyphyletic origin that usually include the green, yellow-green, brown, and red algae in the eukaryotes and especially formerly the cyanobacteria in the prokaryotes

dt: {bc}any of a division (Phaeophyta) of variable mostly marine algae with chlorophyll masked by brown pigment

shortdef: any of a division (Phaeophyta) of variable mostly marine algae with chlorophyll masked by brown pigment

dt: {bc}any of a division (Chrysophyta) of marine and freshwater algae (such as diatoms) containing yellowish-green to golden-brown pigments that obscure the chlorophyll

shortdef: any of a division (Chrysophyta) of marine and freshwater algae (such as diatoms) containing yellowish-green to golden-brown pigments that obscure the chlorophyll —called also chrysophyte

dt: {bc}any of a division (Chlorophyta) of green-colored algae that have chloroplasts and occur especially in fresh water

shortdef: any of a division (Chlorophyta) of green-colored algae that have chloroplasts and occur especially in fresh water

dt: {bc}any of a division (Rhodophyta) of chiefly marine algae that have predominantly red pigmentation

shortdef: any of a division (Rhodophyta) of chiefly marine algae that have predominantly red pigmentation

dt: {bc}any of a class (Xanthophyceae of the division Chrysophyta) of algae with the chlorophyll masked by brown or yellow pigment

shortdef: any of a class (Xanthophyceae of the division Chrysophyta) of algae with the chlorophyll masked by brown or yellow pigment
